vsParam: Hey, Ryza! [px] has found some leather!
Wow! Thank you! This is some stout leather!

Yeah. Because it is for your boot,
we don't want it to rip again if it's not sturdy enough!

OK. Let ask Cresson to sew the boot!
Because he is very good at sewing!
Hey. Peppermint! I heard that you need to have something sewn...
Are you talking about... Ryza's boot? Is it... really OK?
Uh? It's OK with me. I hope you don't mind.
No. I don't. Alright. I'll start right now.
Oh~ Thanks! Here... you are. Thank you so much.
Your boots... are a bit small, aren't they?
Look, the parts near your legs are pretty tight!
Uh. Are they? I never paid attention to that before...
Look, with these tight boots, it's easier to move around. And...

I grew up on an island, and it's very hard to
find a pair of boots that fit.
So it's alright. I don't feel uncomfortable. It's OK!

Oh. I was worrying that your feet might ache
from wearing a pair of unfitting boots.

Ah, right! We can go shop for boots together next time!
I know a great shop!

Really? I look forward to it. I really want to see
what boots in this world look like.

Alright. Boot shopping next time!
Heehee. Sorel, it's a deal.

Yeah. The friendship between girls is so wonderful.
Am I right, Cresson?
Focus... Stay focused, Cresson... Focus on sewing... Sewing...
Hmm. [px], if you were Cresson, you would be troubled, right~?
